alert.note: Alert for Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 12:26AM MDT until August 05 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 1226 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Thurman, or 26 miles north of Flagler, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Washington County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
